meanings.sent1: The company preshipped the products to ensure they arrived on time.
meanings.sent2: I always preshipped my orders to avoid any delays.
meanings.sent3: The idea to preship products seemed like a smart move.
meanings.sent4: She preshipped her worries away, knowing everything would be fine.
meanings.sent5: Preshipping the goods made the process much smoother.

meanings.definition: Already shipped before the expected time.
meanings.sent1: The package arrived preshipped, much to my surprise.
meanings.sent2: The items were preshipped and reached the destination early.
meanings.sent3: He joked that the parcel must have preshipped itself to get here so quickly.
meanings.sent4: The news spread preshipped through the town, causing excitement.
meanings.sent5: The preshipped delivery caught everyone off guard.
